channel.title: OS on Laladee
channel.description: Recent content in OS on Laladee

item.title: Operating System
item.description: Lost grub Some reasons: Upgrade BIOS Reinstall windows while using dual OS Grub not installed in Linux installation progress Re-install grub Re-install grub bootloader Use boot-repair-disk as a rescue tool if can’t boot into linux os, setup into the USB and boot it up grub-install /dev/sda update-grub Check the disk with fdisk -l or blkid Use BOOTICE UEFI uses efi files in EFI partition to boot the OS, as Windows is bootmgfw.
